alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia Basin of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 7:04PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Benton County through 730 PM PDT... At 703 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Benton City, or near Richland, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspout possible, winds in excess of 30 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pasco, Richland, West Richland, Benton City and southeastern Hanford Reservation. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
